name: Hotel Hysteria!
storyline: In this puzzly game, you have to follow the objective (if given at the level start card) to it's fullest, and once you finish it, you're set for a victory! though in your way are many, many, enemies, sometimes beating them up IS the goal!
summary: The evil Dr. Von Gordo has kidnapped Madame Moon! you, Vince Vinchi and your...sidekick Kaizo have to find clues to her location by searching through Dr. Von Gordo's Kooky Hotels!
